alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Union; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern York, southeastern Cherokee and northern Union Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 554 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Union, or near Buffalo, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Union, Monarch Mill, Buffalo, Jonesville, Lockhart, Saratt, Adamsburg, Bullock Creek and Santuc. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
